title: Lower Tapi Dam
text:
Lower Tapi Dam (or Padalsare Dam) is an <a href="dam%23Earth-fill%20dams">earthfill</a> dam on <a href="Tapti%20river">Tapti river</a> near <a href="Amalner">Amalner</a>, but in <a href="Jalgaon%20%20district">Jalgaon district</a> in state of <a href="Maharashtra">Maharashtra</a> in <a href="India">India</a>.
Specifications.
The height of the dam above lowest foundation is while the length is . The volume content is and gross storage capacity is .
